title: And true to form...
body:
We have this issue again.

Leona skins advertised, 
https://imgur.com/a/dlQvEL4
not in shop.

Same goes for Liss and Camille skins.

Fairly routine, the team must be well practiced at fixing this by now.

Moving on!

replies.body: Solar Eclipse Leona looks so hot, like man literally the power of the sun inside her she must be several thousand degrees above room temperature.
It was removed very shortly after, not sure why it was up in the first place though
Probs wasn't deactivated before the patch went live by accident. It happens.
